001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format;
002
003import java.net.URI;
004
005import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
006import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig.Provider;
007import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEncoder;
008import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
009import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable;
010import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.LogConfigurable.KeyParameter;
011import io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.FormatterFactory.FormatterConfig;
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator;
014import io.jstach.svc.ServiceProvider;
015
016/**
017 * Configures Logback style pattern encoders.
018 */
019@ServiceProvider(RainbowGumServiceProvider.class)
020public final class PatternConfigurator implements Configurator {
021
022        /**
023         * For service loader to call.
024         */
025        public PatternConfigurator() {
026                // for service laoder.
027        }
028
029        /**
030         * Pattern encoder uri provider scheme.
031         */
032        public static String PATTERN_SCHEME = "pattern";
033
034        @Override
035        public boolean configure(LogConfig config) {
036                var compiler = compiler(config);
037                config.encoderRegistry().register(PATTERN_SCHEME, new PatternEncoderProvider(compiler, config));
038                return true;
039        }
040
041        static PatternCompiler compiler(LogConfig config) {
042                var registry = config.serviceRegistry().putIfAbsent(PatternRegistry.class, () -> PatternRegistry.of());
043                var compiler = config.serviceRegistry()
044                        .putIfAbsent(PatternCompiler.class, () -> new Compiler(registry, FormatterConfig.of()));
045                return compiler;
046        }
047
048}
049
050record PatternEncoderProvider(PatternCompiler compiler, LogConfig config) implements LogEncoder.EncoderProvider {
051
052        @Override
053        public LogEncoder provide(URI uri, String name, LogProperties properties) {
054                PatternEncoderBuilder b = new PatternEncoderBuilder(name);
055                String prefix = b.propertyPrefix();
056                LogProperties combined = LogProperties.of(uri, prefix, properties);
057                b.fromProperties(combined);
058                return b.build().provide(name, config);
059        }
060
061        @LogConfigurable(name = "PatternEncoderBuilder", prefix = LogProperties.ENCODER_PREFIX)
062        static Provider<LogEncoder> provide(@KeyParameter String name, String pattern) {
063                return (n, config) -> {
064                        var compiler = PatternConfigurator.compiler(config);
065                        return LogEncoder.of(compiler.compile(pattern));
066                };
067        }
068
069}
